CustomField.formula: IF( OR( RecordTypeId = "012400000005OK7", /*MasterShowOccurrence*/ RecordTypeId = "012400000005P1o", /*FieldSecurityCR*/ RecordTypeId = "012400000005P0q", /*CV*/ RecordTypeId = "012400000005P6j", /*DB*/ RecordTypeId = "0124000000016VM", /*IA*/ RecordTypeId = "012400000005P1t", /*LO*/ RecordTypeId = "012400000005P5q", /*LPE*/ RecordTypeId = "124000000014HI", /*LPM*/ RecordTypeId = "012400000005P5v", /*LR*/ RecordTypeId = "0124000000016VN", /*NE*/ RecordTypeId = "012400000005P0W", /*PS*/ RecordTypeId = "012400000005P6k", /*TS*/ RecordTypeId = "012400000005OKC" /*SalesRepShowOccurrence*/), True, False)
